body_html:
@asimshankar
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Native TF methods not found; check that the correct native libraries are present in the APK
Same error on all apps built with this workaround
I put libtensorflow_inference.so in the wrong folder (it belongs in /android-project/libs/armeabi-v7a/ by default). Now everything works fine.
body_text:
@asimshankar
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Native TF methods not found; check that the correct native libraries are present in the APK
Same error on all apps built with this workaround
I put libtensorflow_inference.so in the wrong folder (it belongs in /android-project/libs/armeabi-v7a/ by default). Now everything works fine.
body:
@asimshankar
~~Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Native TF methods not found; check that the correct native libraries are present in the APK~~
~~Same error on all apps built with [this workaround](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/13653#issuecomment-336038164)~~
I put libtensorflow_inference.so in the wrong folder (it belongs in /android-project/libs/armeabi-v7a/ by default). Now everything works fine.
